4-5:Reduced even further to $144!

Secondly, NY Giant Art Devlin, SGC VG 3, but much nicer than grade given! Beautifully Centered F & B, Vivid, Clear bright color, eye appeal couldn't be much better.

4-5:Reduced even more to $51!

I'll pay the shipping in padded w/ tracking--PPal Fam & Frds, ck or MO.

Thanks,
Fred
